SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 52 - CHAR_LENGTH('Videostarts')), 'Videostarts')

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Abonnenten as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Abonnenten) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT 
  subscribers AS Abonnenten 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtube`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) from ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtube WHERE profileId = $profileID and subscribers>0)
  AND subscribers > 0 
  )

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Views as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Views) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
  SELECT sum(views) as Views
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeVideos`
WHERE $Zeitraum 
AND $profileID  = profileId
)

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Views as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Views) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT ROUND(sum(a.views) / MAX(b.days)) as Views
FROM
(SELECT *
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeVideos`
WHERE $Zeitraum 
AND $profileID  = profileId
) as a,
  -- define number of days to compute the average over the number of days
  (SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "Wochenende") THEN 2
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "Letzte 3 Tage") THEN 3
  END AS days)
  AS b

)

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Interaktionen as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Interaktionen) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT SUM(likes + comments ) as Interaktionen FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeVideos` as Interaktionen
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $Zeitraum 
)

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(average as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(average) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT ROUND(SUM(a.likes + a.comments ) / MAX(b.days)) average
FROM 
(SELECT *
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeVideos` 
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $Zeitraum 
) as a,
  -- define number of days to compute the average over the number of days
  (SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "Wochenende") THEN 2
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "Letzte 3 Tage") THEN 3
    ELSE 1
  END AS days)
  AS b
)

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(likes as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(likes) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT SUM(likes) as likes FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeVideos` as Interaktionen
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $Zeitraum 
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(publishedVideos as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(publishedVideos) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT COUNT(profileId) as publishedVideos FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeVideos` 
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $Zeitraum 
)

SELECT 	SUM(subscribersChange)as changesubscribers
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtube`
WHERE $Zeitraum 
AND $profileID  = profileId

(

SELECT
time as Datum,
CONCAT(
  CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(duration,60) AS String)  END ,
  ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(duration,60) AS String)  END) as Dauer,
   title,
views,
link,
likes,
comments,
 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeVideos` 
WHERE profileId = $profileID
  AND $Zeitraum
ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

query.rawSql:
Select a.LRA  FROM
(
SELECT DISTINCT LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` 
) as a 
ORDER BY(
CASE WHEN a.LRA like  LEFT("${__user.login}",3)
THEN 1
ELSE 0
END
) DESC

SELECT a.profile 
FROM 
(SELECT profile FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE LRA = '$LRA' AND youtubeId != 0) as a,
(SELECT  Profil_YT FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.default-settings` WHERE LRA = '$LRA') as b
ORDER BY( 
CASE WHEN a.profile = b.Profil_YT THEN 1
ELSE 2
END
), UPPER(a.profile) ASC

SELECT 
  FORMAT_DATETIME("%e.%m.%Y %n %H:%M Uhr", DATETIME(MAX(last_update), "Europe/Berlin"))  
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtube`
WHERE profileId = $profileID

current.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)
EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  3 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

DATE(time) >= (  SELECT    saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )  AND DATE(time) <= (  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )
EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Gestern : EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letzte 3 Tage : EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  3 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE(), Letztes Wochenende :  DATE(time) >= (  SELECT    saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday\,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )  AND DATE(time) <= (  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday\,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) ), Letzte 7 Tage : EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()
